MITMPage.mitmServerErrorOrStopped: MITM Hijack Server Error or Stopped

MITMServerStartForm.confirmEnableWithReplacementRules: Replacement rules are enabled, which may affect hijacking. Are you sure you want to enable?
MITMServerStartForm.remoteModeTip: In remote mode, you can change it to 0.0.0.0 to listen on all network interfaces of the host
MITMServerStartForm.upstreamProxyTip: Set another proxy for requests passing through this MITM proxy. Typically used to access websites inaccessible from mainland China or to access special networks/intranets. It can also be used for passive scanning. If the proxy requires a password, the format is: http://user:pass@ip:port
MITMServerStartForm.http2SupportTip: Enabling this option will support HTTP/2.0 hijacking. If disabled, it will automatically downgrade to HTTP/1.1. Automatic downgrade also occurs if HTTP/2 negotiation fails after enabling.
MITMServerStartForm.gmTlsHijackTip: Adapts to GM algorithm TLS (GM-tls) hijacking, initiating a GM TLS connection to the target website (Guomi is Chinese national standard)
MITMServerStartForm.randomizeClientHelloTip: Randomize the ClientHello message during access to evade server detection of TLS fingerprints (TLS fingerprint is a characteristic method used to identify and categorize SSL/TLS clients by analyzing the handshake information sent by the client when establishing a secure connection)
MITMServerStartForm.noGmAndRandomTlsFingerprint: Do not configure GM and random TLS fingerprint
MITMServerStartForm.mitmDisableKeepAlive: MITM hijack disables keep-alive. Each hijacked connection will automatically close after processing one request/response.
MITMServerStartForm.applyRules: Apply rules for matching, replacing, tagging, and coloring, and configure the effect location

MITMFormAdvancedConfiguration.saveAdvancedConfigConfirm: Do you want to save the advanced configuration and close the modal?
MITMFormAdvancedConfiguration.gmTLSPriorityTip: Enabling this option will prioritize GM TLS. If the connection fails, it will automatically downgrade to standard TLS. If disabled, standard TLS is prioritized.
MITMFormAdvancedConfiguration.gmTLSOnlyTip: When this option is enabled, other secure transport layers besides GM algorithm TLS will not be supported.
MITMFormAdvancedConfiguration.hijackProxyAuthTip: Enable authentication for the hijack proxy. You need to configure proxy authentication information in the proxy client.
MITMFormAdvancedConfiguration.disableHomePageTip: When enabled, the proxy-free launch will not visit the initial page.
MITMFormAdvancedConfiguration.clientTLSImportTip: Used for capturing traffic of HTTPS websites that enable client verification for mTLS (Mutual TLS).

MITMHijackedContent.deleteFilterContainsAllFailed: Failed to delete all content in filter inclusions:
MITMHijackedContent.enableAllNoReplaceRuleSuccess: Successfully enabled the rule "All No Replace" button
MITMHijackedContent.getHijackFilterFailed: Failed to get Conditional Hijack filter:
MITMHijackedContent.mitmErrorInvalidResponse: BUG: MITM Error, failed to get the correct Response or Response ID
MITMHijackedContent.autoAllowRequestsTip: When checked, all requests will be allowed by default, and the corresponding responses will be hijacked
MITMHijackedContent.plugin_check_tip: Detected configuration of <openReplace/> and <openWhite/> whitelist. If there are packet capture issues, you can first <close/> <tooltip/> the configuration. Detected loading of {{pluginCount}} plugins. If there are packet capture issues, you can click <clear/> to cancel loading plugins.
MITMHijackedContent.closeEnableAllNoReplaceRuleTip: Disabling will enable the rule "All No Replace" button and delete all content in filter inclusions
MITMHijackedContent.plugin_config_tip: Detected configuration of <openReplace/> and <openWhite/> whitelist. If there are packet capture issues, you can first <close/> <tooltip/> the configuration.
MITMHijackedContent.close_rule_tip: Disabling will enable the rule "All No Replace" button and delete all content in filter inclusions
MITMHijackedContent.plugin_white_filter_tip: Detected configuration of <openWhite/> whitelist. If there are packet capture issues, you can first <close/> <tooltip/> the whitelist setting. Detected loading of {{pluginCount}} plugins. If there are packet capture issues, you can click <clear/> to cancel loading plugins.
MITMHijackedContent.close_filter_tip: Disabling will delete all content in filter inclusions
MITMHijackedContent.plugin_replace_rule_tip: Detected configuration of <openReplace/>. If there are packet capture issues, you can first <close/> <tooltip/> the replacement. Detected loading of {{pluginCount}} plugins. If there are packet capture issues, you can click <clear/> to cancel loading plugins.
MITMHijackedContent.close_rule_tip2: Disabling will enable the "All No Replace" button
MITMHijackedContent.plugin_white_filter_tip_simple: Detected configuration of <openWhite/>. If there are packet capture issues, you can first <close/> <tooltip/> the whitelist setting.
MITMHijackedContent.close_filter_tip2: Disabling will delete all content in filter inclusions
MITMHijackedContent.plugin_replace_rule_tip_simple: Detected configuration of <openReplace/>. If there are packet capture issues, you can first <close/> <tooltip/> the replacement.
MITMHijackedContent.close_rule_tip3: Disabling will enable the "All No Replace" button
MITMHijackedContent.plugin_loaded_tip: Detected loading of {{pluginCount}} plugins. If there are packet capture issues, you can click <clear/> to cancel loading plugins.

MITMFiltersModal.conditionMatchTip: 1. Data that meets the conditions will automatically jump to manual hijack view, and the rest of the data will be automatically released.
MITMFiltersModal.basicConfigMatchTip: 2. All basic configuration items except Content-Type and file extension are matched by keyword by default. If you need regex and glob pattern matching, please configure in Advanced Config.
MITMFiltersModal.basicConfigKeywordTip: All basic configuration items except Content-Type and file extension are matched by keyword by default. If you need regex and glob pattern matching, please configure in Advanced Config.

ImportFileModal.importFileFormatInvalid: The imported file does not meet the format requirements
ImportFileModal.import_text: You can drag a file into the box, or <input/> <button>click here</button> to upload. Direct code pasting is also supported.

MitmFilterHistoryStore.cannotDeleteEditingFilter: Cannot delete {editFilterName} while it is being edited

ChromeLauncherButton.closeAllChromeProxySuccess: Successfully closed all proxy-free Chrome instances
ChromeLauncherButton.closeAllChromeFailed: Failed to close all Chrome instances:
ChromeLauncherButton.confirmEnableWithReplacementRules: Replacement rules are enabled, which may affect hijacking. Are you sure you want to enable?
ChromeLauncherButton.confirmStartNoConfig: Confirm starting proxy-free Chrome with parameters

MITMChromeLauncher.chromeStartFailed: Chrome failed to start: {e}. Please try selecting to start with default configuration.
MITMChromeLauncher.setNewPathForNewWindow: To open a new window, please set a new path to store user data
MITMChromeLauncher.unsavedEditWarning: There are unsaved edits. Please click the Save button.
MITMChromeLauncher.parameterNameNotFilled: A parameter name is not filled
MITMChromeLauncher.start_proxy_tip:
This button will start a Chrome browser with the proxy already correctly configured (using the system Chrome browser configuration)
No additional proxy activation is required from the user, and it separates the testing browser from the daily-use browser
MITMChromeLauncher.ignore_cert_tip:
Note:
The proxy-free browser has enabled {{flag}}
This option is effective and will ignore all certificate errors. It is only recommended to enable it for security testing
MITMChromeLauncher.preset_param_tip: Preset parameters allow configuring enabled parameters and values in 'More Parameters'. Minimal parameters cannot be configured. If starting with preset parameters <error>fails</error>, please select to start with minimal parameters.

ChromeLauncherParamsSet.restoreAllParamsWarning: Are you sure you want to restore all parameters to their default state? All custom settings will be lost.

MITMPluginLocalList.getOrImportPluginsTip: You can get official cloud plugins with one click, or import external plugin sources

MITMYakScriptLoader.sendToHotReloadForDebug: Send to [Hot Reload] to debug code?

MITMPluginHijackContent.updateMitmPluginStatusFailed: Failed to update MITM plugin status:
MITMPluginHijackContent.mitmInteractiveHijackV1NotSupported: MITM Interactive Hijack v1 is not supported yet

PluginTrace.pluginTrackingTip: Enable tracking to view the specific execution status and failure reasons of plugins
PluginTrace.enterPluginOrHookNameToSearch: Enter plugin name or Hook name to search
PluginTrace.listNotFound: List not found, unable to locate
PluginTrace.statusCompletedAndRemoved: : Status completed and automatically removed from the list, unable to locate

ImportLocalPlugin.accessRepoViaProxy: Access code repositories that are inaccessible from mainland China via proxy: e.g., http://127.0.0.1:7890
ImportLocalPlugin.enterLocalPluginPath: Please enter the local plugin path
ImportLocalPlugin.enterPluginID: Please enter plugin IDs, separated by 'commas' or 'new lines'...
ImportLocalPlugin.enterNucleiPoCLocalPath: Please enter the Nuclei PoC local path
ImportLocalPlugin.externalResourceWarning: Importing external resources has potential risks and may introduce malicious code or payloads, leading to data leaks, system compromises, and other serious consequences. Please carefully consider the necessity of importing external resources and ensure the source is trustworthy and the content is safe. If you must use external resources, it is recommended to prioritize official, secure versions or write your own controllable data sources. Additionally, please keep your system and software up to date, promptly fix known vulnerabilities, and maintain daily security protection.

MITMFilters.uriMatchExplanation: Can be understood as URI matching, e.g., /main/index.php?a=123
MITMFilters.uriFilterExplanation: Can be understood as URI filtering, e.g., /main/index

MITMAdvancedFilters.completeExistingConditionBeforeAdding: Please complete the configuration of the existing condition before adding a new one

MITMAdvancedFiltersItem.completeExistingConditionBeforeAdding: Please complete the configuration of the existing condition before adding a new one

MITMRule.http_header_cookie_priority_tip: HTTP Header and HTTP Cookie have a higher priority and will overwrite the body content
MITMRule.enable_substitute_then_discard_tip: After enabling substitution, you can discard the current request/response
MITMRule.option_no_replace_request_tip: This option only applies to requests. When enabled, the (request) packet will not be replaced, and the substituted result will be sent as an extra packet
MITMRule.select_request_or_response_header_body_t: After selecting request or response, at least one of Header and Body must be selected
MITMRule.replace_rule_effect_warning: A replacement rule has been detected. This may affect interception. Are you sure you want to enable it?
MITMRule.drag_disabled_tip: Dragging is disabled. You can only drag rules within the same status
MITMRule.save_rule_and_close_prompt: Do you want to save the rule content and close the pop-up window?

MITMRuleImport.copy_json_into_box_tip: You can copy JSON code into the box below

MITMRuleFromModal.group_matching_tip: Enter 0 to match all; enter a number to match the entered group; leave blank to match the first group by default
MITMRuleFromModal.http_header_cookie_priority_tip: HTTP Header and HTTP Cookie have a higher priority and will overwrite the body content
MITMRuleFromModal.enter_content_to_replace_tip: Enter the content you want to replace, can be empty~
MITMRuleFromModal.url_specific_rule_tip: The rule will only be effective for this URL; regular expressions are supported

RuleContent.use_right_tool_generate_regex: You can use the tool on the right to automatically generate a regex
RuleContent.select_in_editor_generate_regex: Select content in the editor to automatically generate a regex

ProxyConfig.title: Proxy Rules Configuration
ProxyConfig.tip: Customize Proxy Rule Groups According To Your Needs
ProxyConfig.disable_add_new_route: Please configure at least one proxy node.
ProxyConfig.confirm_delete_all: Are You Sure You Want To Delete? This Cannot Be Undone
ProxyConfig.valid_proxy_address_tip: Please Enter Valid Proxy Address (E.g.: http://127.0.0.1:8080)
ProxyConfig.proxy_address_placeholder: Please select or enter a proxy address. If the proxy requires a password, the format is: http://user:pass@ip:port
ProxyConfig.migration_title: Whether to migrate the downstream agent configuration data to the new version; if not, it is considered that the historical data should be abandoned.
ProxyConfig.address_tip: After configuration, only the target address uses the proxy, and all other traffic does not use the proxy.
ProxyConfig.delete_point_tips: This Points is still referenced by {i} rules; deleting it will remove it from those rules as well. Continue?
ProxyConfig.detectionLoading: Testing in progress, please wait patiently...
ProxyConfig.disable_point_tips: This Points is still referenced by {i} rules; Disable it will remove it from those rules as well. Continue?
